text: Bosley Crowther (July 13, 1905 â€“ March 7, 1981) was an American journalist and author. He was a movie critic for The New York Times for 27 years. His reviews and articles helped shape the careers of actors, directors and screenwriters, though his reviews, at times, were thought of as unnecessarily mean. Crowther died in Mount Kisco, New York from heart failure, aged 75 ==References== ==Other websites== *New York Times links to numerous film reviews by Crowther Category:1905 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:American journalists Category:American movie critics Category:Writers from Maryland Category:Writers from New York City
title: Bosley Crowther
